item.description:
Children's Museum is one of the most popular places to visit in Boston. You can check out their website on www.bostonchildrenmuseum.org

Why don't we meet there on Saturday morning for kids to enjoy?!

When: March 13th Saturday
Time: 10:30AM
Where: Children's Museum
308 Congress st
Boston, MA
(617) 426-6500

Everybody's invited!! Bring your hubby, friends, & kids!!!

Remember, you can get FREE MUSUEM passes at your LOCAL LIBRARY!!!
Any questions? Email me at nuhmoeya@hotmail.com
Hope to see you there!
item.name: Fun time at Children's Musuem!
